General.Name: Archon Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Archon Minerals Limited engages in the diamond exploration activities in the Northwest Territories of Canada. The company has interests in the Buffer Zone, WO Block, and Monument Diamond projects located in the Mackenzie Mining Division of the Northwest Territories. Archon Minerals Limited is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 323 Jervis Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6P 3P8
